attributes.action: Initiate, in recognition of the Serving Personnel in todays Armed Forces, a joyous day of celebration to those still serving, or livng Ex Forces to Her Majesty, Queen Elizabeth the Second
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is always recognised that we, as a Nation, remember those who have served, and unfortunately died whether in service or any circumstance on Remembrance Day. This petition would serve to 'celebrate' those personnel who are currently serving members of the Armed Forces or who have served, and are still alive. It would be a National Armed Forces Day which would boost morale and serve to recognise all who are continuously striving to serve The Crown.
